range.value: Integer values in the range -65536 to -1
range.registration_rule: used for key parameters specific to a single algorithm delegated to the COSE Key Type Parameters registry

record.name: used for key parameters specific to a single algorithm delegated to the COSE Key Type Parameters registry
record.label: -65536 to -1

record.name: kid
record.description: Key identification value - match to kid in message

record.name: alg
record.description: Key usage restriction to this algorithm

record.name: Base IV
record.description: Base IV to be XORed with Partial IVs

record.name: crv
record.description: EC identifier -- Taken from the "COSE Elliptic Curves" registry

record.name: crv
record.description: EC identifier -- Taken from the "COSE Elliptic Curves" registry

record.name: p
record.description: the prime factor p of n

record.name: q
record.description: the prime factor q of n

record.name: qInv
record.description: qInv is the CRT coefficient q^(-1) mod p

record.name: r_i
record.description: a prime factor r_i of n, where i >= 3

record.name: t_i
record.description: the CRT coefficient t_i = (r_1 * r_2 * ... * r_(i-1))^(-1) mod r_i

record.name: pub
record.description: Public key for HSS/LMS hash-based digital signature

record.name: t-values
record.description: List of T-values, entries in F_q

record.name: matrix 1
record.description: NxN Matrix of entries in F_q in column-major form

record.name: matrix 2
record.description: NxN Matrix of entries in F_q in column-major form

record.name: EC2
record.description: Elliptic Curve Keys w/ x- and y-coordinate pair

record.name: HSS-LMS
record.description: Public key for HSS/LMS hash-based digital signature

record.name: P-256
record.description: NIST P-256 also known as secp256r1

record.name: P-384
record.description: NIST P-384 also known as secp384r1

record.name: P-521
record.description: NIST P-521 also known as secp521r1

record.name: X25519
record.description: X25519 for use w/ ECDH only

record.name: X448
